ProductType.Question: What kind of digital product do you need?

Success.line2: We will get back to you within 2 business days!

App.tech1: With push notifications, you can send direct messages to the end device of the users on which the software is installed.
App.tech2: NFC can be used to establish near field communication for thecontactless exchange of data. This isused, for example, in lockingsystems, contactless paymentsystems, or automation systems.
App.tech3: Bluetooth is a short-range wireless connectivity option, which is used,for example, to connect to technical accessories such as headsets, butcan only transmit data.
App.tech4: Encryption ensures that either the transmission or storage of confidential data is secured(encrypted) so that it can only be accessed with authorization.
App.tech5: This function enables the output of sounds/music in the software.
App.tech6: Via the integration of the camera, you can take pictures and videos andprocess them in the software.
App.tech7: The gyroscope in modern devices provides data about the movement and orientation of the device.
App.tech8: The GPS allows access to location data and can be used for navigation and tracking.
App.tech9: There is a possibility to display advertising within the software as a source of revenue, for instance.
App.tech10: A login system includes the possibility to create and manage user accounts and to map individualized processes in the app.
App.tech11: A role system allows different rights/roles to be distinguished in the app.This allows access to different functions and content to bemanaged.
App.tech12: The app may be offered for a fee, soit must be purchased at a purchase price before installation
App.tech13: So-called In-app purchases offer thepossibility to create paid offers inside the app.
App.tech14: With synchronization, it is possible to keep data on different systems always at the same level.
App.tech15: A backup function allows the app's data to be backed up externally so that no data is lost in the event of a failure
App.tech16: This function makes it possible to request a rating from the user during operation of the app. This usually ensures more and better ratings.
App.tech17: The integration of social networks allows to display their content and interact with them, as well as to usethe login via them also for the own app.
App.tech18: A calendar integration maps the localor external calendar in the app and can display and edit it.
App.tech19: The address book integration allows access to the contacts of the address book on the mobile device.
App.tech20: The integration of analytics services makes it possible to collect data on the usage of the app and the users inorder to better understand user behavior and optimize the app more.

Website.tech1: With push notifications, you can send direct messages to the end device ofthe users on which the software is installed.
Website.tech2: Video integration allows you todisplay and play videos on the website.
Website.tech3: Certain elements can be animated and lift the static look of the website.
Website.tech4: Encryption ensures that either the transmission or storage of confidential data is secured(encrypted) so that it can only be accessed with authorization.
Website.tech5: If news is published regularly in the form of podcast or text articles, a simple content maintenance system should be integrated
Website.tech6: Via the integration of the camera, you can take pictures and videos and process them in the software.
Website.tech8: There is a possibility to display advertising within the software as a source of revenue, for instance.
Website.tech9: A login system includes the possibility to create and manage user accounts and to map individualized processes in the app.
Website.tech10: A role system allows different rights/roles to be distinguished in the app.This allows access to different functions and content to be managed.
Website.tech11: The integration of analytics services makes it possible to collect data on the usage of the app and the users in order to better understand userbehavior and optimize the app more.
Website.tech12: With synchronization, it is possible to keep data on different systems always at the same level.
Website.tech13: With pop-up windows you can additionally claim the attention of the users, e.g. if you want to influence the subscription to the newsletter.
Website.tech14: The integration of social networks allows to display their content and interact with them, as well as to use the login via them also for the own app.
Website.tech15: A calendar integration maps the localor external calendar in the app and can display and edit it.
Website.tech16: The address book integration allows access to the contacts of the address book on the mobile device.
